name: spa-static
description: It's Spastatic! It generates static HTML pages of a website to improve page loading time and making it SEO friendly

scripts.build-patch: tsc && git commit -am 'BUILD : Patch update' && npm version patch
scripts.build-minor: tsc && git commit -am 'BUILD : Minor update' && npm version minor
scripts.build-major: tsc && git commit -am 'BUILD : Major update' && npm version major

author: Hugo Nogueira
